Program on Public Consultation 2015 Federal Budget Exercise
 
 My results were a $235.7 billion surplus and I solved 137.5% of the SS deficit problem, while limiting cuts to non invasive (that would be cuts that most people will not even notice).

post_info.post_title: Fun little "create your own budget" tool

Program on Public Consultation 2015 Federal Budget Exercise
 
 My results were a $235.7 billion surplus and I solved 137.5% of the SS deficit problem, while limiting cuts to non invasive (that would be cuts that most people will not even notice).

 $561.9 billion surplus.
 
 They were missing a couple options though like cutting the taxes entirely :p

This is pretty cool... I was actually looking to create a website to do this very thing, only more detailed. Props to them for doing it!
 
 I got $68.1 billion surplus which was $0 before the tax increases. I cut everything by 15% and then defense and a few other odds and ends by up to 55%. I increased the top 3 tax brackets by 10,5,5.
 
 i only solved 87.5% of the long term SS problem (based on options).

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Fun little "create your own budget" tool
